short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the Confluence Cloud search bar and ensure that all search queries are handled by the iFinder enterprise search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Confluence Cloud search with iFinder Confluence Search. Our browser extension is a must-have add-on for the seamless iFinder Confluence Search experience, available in the Atlassian Marketplace. Say goodbye to mediocre search results, as our extension replaces the existing search bar in Confluence Cloud, allowing all your search queries to be handled by our powerful enterprise search. 

To start using this plugin, simply create an Atlassian Confluence Cloud account and install the “iFinder Confluence Search – Cloud Edition” App.
